text: 23:16-17 Matyu 27:15; Jon 18:39Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ pura a fozoregh, an ateghtɨ a mangam.”23:16-17 Fofozir gumazir maba mɨgɨa ghaze, akar igharazir mam uaghan vezɨn kam iti. A kamakɨn, “Me arazir kam iti, me azeniba bar, Isar Ekiamɨn Dughiar kamɨn itima, Pailat kalabusɨn gumazir mam ataghizɨ a me bagha zui.” Nɨ Mak 15:6ɨn gan.
